name: SEMANTICS
description:
Unidentified child, Mora.
Mora wants a certain piece. Let me help you.
Mora may be pleased.

It is a simple rhythm game operated by mouse pointer.
There are four types of endings. Varies according to the number of pieces or the score.
It is a mini game made in two weeks.
Please play some sounds.

The thing I update most is Twitter.
-> @am23ti
